ygData.subject: Re: ___JBoots___
ygData.msgSnippet: ust a side note about the Jboots.. the effect isnt as good as SoW.. it is slightly slower then SoW. Just incase anyone wanted to know.. The jboots are in fact
ygData.messageBody:
ust a side note about the Jboots.. the effect isnt as good as SoW.. it is
slightly slower then SoW. Just incase anyone wanted to know..

The jboots are in fact slower than sow and the effect doesnt last as long
either, but there is one advantage, you can recharge the effect while
running, so if that mob is on your tail and the jboot sow is leaving you can
open your pack and click on them while running and never lose speed. A very
nice compensation if you ask me.

Edar Celebrian Mage of Innoruk
Took me 16 hours to get the boots
